name: Moong Dal Chilas
instructions: Take 1 cup of washed Moong Dal.
Add 1 cup of water and let it soak for 3 hours.
Once the dal is soaked, remove the excess water.
With the soaked dal, add 2 green chillies and 1 inch of ginger.
Grind it well into a thick paste.
Take this out in a bowl.
Add 1 tsp turmeric powder, 1 tsp salt, and 1 tsp red chilli powder.
Mix this well. The batter for Moong Chila is ready.
Grease the pan with some oil.
Pour the Moong Dal batter over it and flatten it like a dosa.
Sprinkle some chaat masala, chopped coriander leaves, and red chilli powder.
Add some ghee on top and let it cook from one side.
Flip it over and cook the other side as well.

name: Green Chutney
instructions: Add 2 garlic cloves, 2 green chillies, 1 inch ginger (sliced), 1 tsp chaat masala, 1 tsp salt, 1 tbsp lemon juice, and 2 tbsp water.
